Text: does the vinyl rip have better sound than 2009 remasters????????

well... i dont have a milti-million dollar studio to transfer the songs, but i still think it sounds just as good. 
i've been doing some side by sides, and i find the 2009 has a little too much bass, these rips sound more "original" than the remasters
remastered versions are bullshit..  ty for these

remasters in general are victims to the loudness wars that have started in the middle of the 80s I suggest downloading/buying these early recordings since they are of greater value to those with more subtle listening skills... and plz seed
Thanks for this! Please seed everyone! This is a large file and the more ppl seeding, the quicker we all have this awesome album.
